home_tell_us_text: We will make you the best recomendations when we know what you like
home_success_modal_message: Your request has been successfully sent
home_valid_phon_inv: Phone number must contain only numbers and "()-# "
home_banner_text: Our platform allows to host an online event, conference or a festival. We allow event organisers, visitors, exhibitors and sponsors to interact and network in the most fun and easy way.
home_l_online_events_title: All your online events in one place!
home_l_online_events_textbox:
It takes time to setup an event, therefore it is not easy to do everything by yourself. Managing an event made easy by inviting your co-workers to the events you have created in the platform.

There is so much to the event, setting it up, host it live, managing, here are a few things you can collaborate with your staff on

  • Customise your event with your staff
  • Invite stands/booths, let them customise their space
  • Invite sponsors and set up campaigns for them
  • Sell tickets
home_l_features_1_textbox:
Multilingual setup

Sometimes it is not enough to provide content in a single language, so we stepped up and give you the possibility create content in multiple languages

  • Possibility of translating event content to other languages
  • Customers accessing the local domain openexpo.fr will see the translated content
  • Manage the event in different languages for cross-boarder staff
home_l_features_2_textbox:
Advanced sponsorship

Sponsors would love to see something more than just their logo on the event, so we decided to introduce different sponsorship tiers

  • Add sponsor’s banners, videos, logo at the top of the page!
  • Choose the tiers for every sponsor: Gold, Silver and Bronze
  • Provide analytics to your sponsors about their tier campaign
home_l_features_3_textbox:
Streaming integrations

Openexpo allows you to not only use our internal video service, but “plug-in” with your own Video resources. If you are used to using something similar to Twitch, Youtube streaming with OBS integrations, then you are in the right place
home_l_features_bottom_button: Go to full list of features!
home_l_customize_title: Customize your event to stand out from the crowd!
home_l_customize_item1_text: Content creation - articles for the event
home_l_customize_item3_text: Customise your event to your company’s style
home_l_stands_textbox:
Large events always include loads of different companies that would like to promote themselves, thus we are giving the event organisers this functionality.

  • Unlimited number of booths/stands on the event
  • Chat with stand staff
  • Unique UI for and customization for stands!
home_l_useopenexpo_title: Customize your event to stand out from the crowd!
home_l_useopenexpo_item1_text: Host your educating seminar with our platform in a few clicks
home_l_useopenexpo_item2_text: If you are a Start Up event, let startupers pitch their company
home_l_useopenexpo_item3_text: Create interactive workshops through our platform
home_l_useopenexpo_item4_text: Invite awesome speakers and host your conference
home_l_useopenexpo_item5_text: Show live featured teams in virtual cinemas
home_l_useopenexpo_item6_text: The whole point for the event is networking, therefore we give this opportunity
home_l_useopenexpo_item7_text: Create unlimited booths/stands and give companies possibility to promote themselves
home_l_useopenexpo_item8_text: Wouldn’t it be cool be on an offline event, but never physically attending this? We can do this!
home_l_useopenexpo_bottom_text: What are you waiting for? First event is free of charge!
home_l_features_textbox: Each event organiser and exhibitor is able to create as many blog posts and news for the event as needed which would also be sent to the users who have bought the ticket or has followed the event.
home_l_faq_title: Got any questions? Here are the most common ones!
